timezoneParams.option: GMT(London, Dublin, Edinburgh, Lisbon, Casablanca, Monrovia)
GMT+1:00 (Paris,Amsterdam, Berlin, Rome, Vienna, Madrid, Warsaw, Brussels)
GMT+2:00 (Israel, Cairo, Athens, Helsinki, Istanbul, Buchrest)
GMT+8:00 (Beijing, Singapore, Taipei, Kuala Lumpur, Irkutsk, Perth)
GMT+10:00 (Brisbane, Sydney, Melbourne, Canberra, Guam, Hobart)

device.deviceconfig:
# PCC Standard Format File # DO NOT CHANGE THIS LINE!
############################################################ # Line 1 Settings # ############################################################ ## Username and Password PHONE_NUMBER_1="%%extension_number%%" SIP_URI_1="%%extension_number%%" SIP_AUTHID_1="%%extension_auth_id%%" SIP_PASS_1="%%extension_auth_pw%%"
##Vbox System VM_NUMBER_1="%%vm_number%%" VM_SUBSCRIBE_ENABLE="Y"
## Display Name on Phone Display DISPLAY_NAME_1="%%extension_first_name%% %%extension_last_name%%"
############################################################ # Line 2-8 Generic Settings # ############################################################ ##Vbox System VM_NUMBER_2="%%vm_number%%" VM_NUMBER_3="%%vm_number%%" VM_NUMBER_4="%%vm_number%%" VM_NUMBER_5="%%vm_number%%" VM_NUMBER_6="%%vm_number%%" VM_NUMBER_7="%%vm_number%%" VM_NUMBER_8="%%vm_number%%"
######################################################## ### Network Location Setting for Identity 1 ### ########################################################
######################### LAN ######################### {IF network=LOCALLAN} # IP Adress of the 3CX PhoneSystem to register to (SIP) for Line1 SIP_RGSTR_ADDR_1="%%pbx_ip%%" SIP_RGSTR_PORT_1="%%param::sipport%%"
SIP_PRSNC_ADDR_1="%%pbx_ip%%" SIP_PRSNC_PORT_1="%%param::sipport%%"
SIP_PRXY_ADDR_1="%%pbx_ip%%" SIP_PRXY_PORT_1="%%param::sipport%%"
# IP Adress of the 3CX PhoneSystem to register to (SIP) for Line2 SIP_RGSTR_ADDR_2="%%pbx_ip%%" SIP_RGSTR_PORT_2="%%param::sipport%%"
SIP_PRSNC_ADDR_2="%%pbx_ip%%" SIP_PRSNC_PORT_2="%%param::sipport%%"
SIP_PRXY_ADDR_2="%%pbx_ip%%" SIP_PRXY_PORT_2="%%param::sipport%%"
# IP Adress of the 3CX PhoneSystem to register to (SIP) for Line3 SIP_RGSTR_ADDR_3="%%pbx_ip%%" SIP_RGSTR_PORT_3="%%param::sipport%%"
SIP_PRSNC_ADDR_3="%%pbx_ip%%" SIP_PRSNC_PORT_3="%%param::sipport%%"
SIP_PRXY_ADDR_3="%%pbx_ip%%" SIP_PRXY_PORT_3="%%param::sipport%%"
# IP Adress of the 3CX PhoneSystem to register to (SIP) for Line4 SIP_RGSTR_ADDR_4="%%pbx_ip%%" SIP_RGSTR_PORT_4="%%param::sipport%%"
SIP_PRSNC_ADDR_4="%%pbx_ip%%" SIP_PRSNC_PORT_4="%%param::sipport%%"
SIP_PRXY_ADDR_4="%%pbx_ip%%" SIP_PRXY_PORT_4="%%param::sipport%%"
# IP Adress of the 3CX PhoneSystem to register to (SIP) for Line5 SIP_RGSTR_ADDR_5="%%pbx_ip%%" SIP_RGSTR_PORT_5="%%param::sipport%%"
SIP_PRSNC_ADDR_5="%%pbx_ip%%" SIP_PRSNC_PORT_5="%%param::sipport%%"
SIP_PRXY_ADDR_5="%%pbx_ip%%" SIP_PRXY_PORT_5="%%param::sipport%%"
# IP Adress of the 3CX PhoneSystem to register to (SIP) for Line6 SIP_RGSTR_ADDR_6="%%pbx_ip%%" SIP_RGSTR_PORT_6="%%param::sipport%%"
SIP_PRSNC_ADDR_6="%%pbx_ip%%" SIP_PRSNC_PORT_6="%%param::sipport%%"
SIP_PRXY_ADDR_6="%%pbx_ip%%" SIP_PRXY_PORT_6="%%param::sipport%%"
# IP Adress of the 3CX PhoneSystem to register to (SIP) for Line7 SIP_RGSTR_ADDR_7="%%pbx_ip%%" SIP_RGSTR_PORT_7="%%param::sipport%%"
SIP_PRSNC_ADDR_7="%%pbx_ip%%" SIP_PRSNC_PORT_7="%%param::sipport%%"
SIP_PRXY_ADDR_7="%%pbx_ip%%" SIP_PRXY_PORT_7="%%param::sipport%%"
# IP Adress of the 3CX PhoneSystem to register to (SIP) for Line8 SIP_RGSTR_ADDR_8="%%pbx_ip%%" SIP_RGSTR_PORT_8="%%param::sipport%%"
SIP_PRSNC_ADDR_8="%%pbx_ip%%" SIP_PRSNC_PORT_8="%%param::sipport%%"
SIP_PRXY_ADDR_8="%%pbx_ip%%" SIP_PRXY_PORT_8="%%param::sipport%%"
# Local SIP Port for the phone (SIP) Line1 SIP_SRC_PORT_1="5060"
# Local SIP Port for the phone (SIP) Line2 SIP_SRC_PORT_2="5070"
# Local SIP Port for the phone (SIP) Line3 SIP_SRC_PORT_3="5080"
# Local SIP Port for the phone (SIP) Line4 SIP_SRC_PORT_4="5090"
# Local SIP Port for the phone (SIP) Line5 SIP_SRC_PORT_5="5100"
# Local SIP Port for the phone (SIP) Line6 SIP_SRC_PORT_6="5110"
# Local SIP Port for the phone (SIP) Line7 SIP_SRC_PORT_7="5120"
# Local SIP Port for the phone (SIP) Line8 SIP_SRC_PORT_1="5130"
# NAT Default Sertting Line1 PORT_PUNCH_INTERVAL_1="0" SIP_ADD_RPORT_1="N"
# NAT Default Sertting Line2 PORT_PUNCH_INTERVAL_2="0" SIP_ADD_RPORT_2="N"
# NAT Default Sertting Line3 PORT_PUNCH_INTERVAL_3="0" SIP_ADD_RPORT_3="N"
# NAT Default Sertting Line4 PORT_PUNCH_INTERVAL_4="0" SIP_ADD_RPORT_4="N"
# NAT Default Sertting Line5 PORT_PUNCH_INTERVAL_5="0" SIP_ADD_RPORT_5="N"
# NAT Default Sertting Line6 PORT_PUNCH_INTERVAL_6="0" SIP_ADD_RPORT_6="N"
# NAT Default Sertting Line7 PORT_PUNCH_INTERVAL_7="0" SIP_ADD_RPORT_7="N"
# NAT Default Sertting Line8 PORT_PUNCH_INTERVAL_8="0" SIP_ADD_RPORT_8="N"
# SPM Default Sertting Line1 SIP_REQURI_PORT_1="Y" SIP_OUTPROXY_ADDR_1="" SIP_OUTPROXY_PORT_1="5060"
# SPM Default Sertting Line2 SIP_REQURI_PORT_2="Y" SIP_OUTPROXY_ADDR_2="" SIP_OUTPROXY_PORT_2="5060"
# SPM Default Sertting Line3 SIP_REQURI_PORT_3="Y" SIP_OUTPROXY_ADDR_3="" SIP_OUTPROXY_PORT_3="5060"
# SPM Default Sertting Line4 SIP_REQURI_PORT_4="Y" SIP_OUTPROXY_ADDR_4="" SIP_OUTPROXY_PORT_4="5060"
# SPM Default Sertting Line5 SIP_REQURI_PORT_5="Y" SIP_OUTPROXY_ADDR_5="" SIP_OUTPROXY_PORT_5="5060"
# SPM Default Sertting Line6 SIP_REQURI_PORT_6="Y" SIP_OUTPROXY_ADDR_6="" SIP_OUTPROXY_PORT_6="5060"
# SPM Default Sertting Line7 SIP_REQURI_PORT_7="Y" SIP_OUTPROXY_ADDR_7="" SIP_OUTPROXY_PORT_7="5060"
# SPM Default Sertting Line8 SIP_REQURI_PORT_8="Y" SIP_OUTPROXY_ADDR_8="" SIP_OUTPROXY_PORT_8="5060"
##Register & Subscribtion Timer Line1 REG_EXPIRE_TIME_1="900" REG_INTERVAL_RATE_1="90" SIP_SUBS_EXPIRE_1="900"
##Register & Subscribtion Timer Line2 REG_EXPIRE_TIME_2="900" REG_INTERVAL_RATE_2="90" SIP_SUBS_EXPIRE_2="900"
##Register & Subscribtion Timer Line3 REG_EXPIRE_TIME_3="900" REG_INTERVAL_RATE_3="90" SIP_SUBS_EXPIRE_3="900"
##Register & Subscribtion Timer Line4 REG_EXPIRE_TIME_4="900" REG_INTERVAL_RATE_4="90" SIP_SUBS_EXPIRE_4="900"
##Register & Subscribtion Timer Line5 REG_EXPIRE_TIME_5="900" REG_INTERVAL_RATE_5="90" SIP_SUBS_EXPIRE_5="900"
##Register & Subscribtion Timer Line6 REG_EXPIRE_TIME_6="900" REG_INTERVAL_RATE_6="90" SIP_SUBS_EXPIRE_6="900"
##Register & Subscribtion Timer Line7 REG_EXPIRE_TIME_7="900" REG_INTERVAL_RATE_7="90" SIP_SUBS_EXPIRE_7="900"
##Register & Subscribtion Timer Line8 REG_EXPIRE_TIME_8="900" REG_INTERVAL_RATE_8="90" SIP_SUBS_EXPIRE_8="900"
# Audio Default Port Range (SDP/RTP) RTP_PORT_MIN="16000" RTP_PORT_MAX="20000" RTP_PTIME="20"
# STUN Server Default Sertting STUN_SERV_ADDR="" STUN_SERV_PORT="3478"
# Firmware Update FIRM_VERSION="01.081" FIRM_FILE_PATH="%%PROVLINKLOCAL%%/firmware/%%firmware%%"
# Provisioning Update Link CFG_STANDARD_FILE_PATH="%%PROVLINKLOCAL%%/Config{mac}.cfg"
# Pana Phonebook XMLAPP_ENABLE="Y" XMLAPP_LDAP_URL="%%PROVLINKLOCAL%%/panasonic_phonebook.xml" {ENDIF}
############################################################ # Telephone Settings # ############################################################ ## Multi Number Settings INCOMING_CALL_GROUP_1="1,0,0,0,0,0,0" INCOMING_CALL_GROUP_2="0,1,0,0,0,0,0" INCOMING_CALL_GROUP_3="0,0,1,0,0,0,0" INCOMING_CALL_GROUP_4="0,0,0,1,0,0,0" INCOMING_CALL_GROUP_5="0,0,0,0,1,0,0" INCOMING_CALL_GROUP_6="0,0,0,0,0,1,0" INCOMING_CALL_GROUP_7="1,1,1,1,1,1,1" INCOMING_CALL_GROUP_8="1,1,1,1,1,1,1"
OUTGOING_CALL_LINE_HS1="1,0,0,0,0,0,0,0" OUTGOING_CALL_LINE_HS2="0,1,0,0,0,0,0,0" OUTGOING_CALL_LINE_HS3="0,0,1,0,0,0,0,0" OUTGOING_CALL_LINE_HS4="0,0,0,1,0,0,0,0" OUTGOING_CALL_LINE_HS5="0,0,0,0,1,0,0,0" OUTGOING_CALL_LINE_HS6="0,0,0,0,0,1,0,0" OUTGOING_CALL_LINE_BS="1,1,1,1,1,1,1,1"
DEFAULT_LINE_SELECT_HS1="1,0,0,0,0,0,0,0" DEFAULT_LINE_SELECT_HS2="0,1,0,0,0,0,0,0" DEFAULT_LINE_SELECT_HS3="0,0,1,0,0,0,0,0" DEFAULT_LINE_SELECT_HS4="0,0,0,1,0,0,0,0" DEFAULT_LINE_SELECT_HS5="0,0,0,0,1,0,0,0" DEFAULT_LINE_SELECT_HS6="0,0,0,0,0,1,0,0" DEFAULT_LINE_SELECT_BS="1,0,0,0,0,0,0,0"
############################################################ # SIP Settings # ############################################################ ##Sip User Agent SIP_USER_AGENT="Panasonic_{MODEL}/{fwver} ({mac})" SIP_RESPONSE_CODE_DND="403" SIP_RESPONSE_CODE_CALL_REJECT="603" ##Enable MOH from 3CX HOLD_SOUND_PATH_1="1" HOLD_SOUND_PATH_2="1" HOLD_SOUND_PATH_3="1" HOLD_SOUND_PATH_4="1" HOLD_SOUND_PATH_5="1" HOLD_SOUND_PATH_6="1" HOLD_SOUND_PATH_7="1" HOLD_SOUND_PATH_8="1"
############################################################ # Codec Settings for line 1 # ############################################################ #Codec 1 G722 CODEC_ENABLE0_1="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY0_1="%%codec1%%" CODEC_ENABLE0_2="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY0_2="%%codec1%%" CODEC_ENABLE0_3="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY0_3="%%codec1%%" CODEC_ENABLE0_4="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY0_4="%%codec1%%" CODEC_ENABLE0_5="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY0_5="%%codec1%%" CODEC_ENABLE0_6="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY0_6="%%codec1%%" CODEC_ENABLE0_7="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY0_7="%%codec1%%" CODEC_ENABLE0_8="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY0_8="%%codec1%%"
#Codec 2 G711A CODEC_ENABLE1_1="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY1_1="5" CODEC_ENABLE1_2="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY1_2="5" CODEC_ENABLE1_3="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY1_3="5" CODEC_ENABLE1_4="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY1_4="5" CODEC_ENABLE1_5="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY1_5="5" CODEC_ENABLE1_6="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY1_6="5" CODEC_ENABLE1_7="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY1_7="5" CODEC_ENABLE1_8="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY1_8="5"
#Codec 3 G726-32 CODEC_ENABLE2_1="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY2_1="%%codec3%%" CODEC_ENABLE2_2="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY2_2="%%codec3%%" CODEC_ENABLE2_3="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY2_3="%%codec3%%" CODEC_ENABLE2_4="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY2_4="%%codec3%%" CODEC_ENABLE2_5="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY2_5="%%codec3%%" CODEC_ENABLE2_6="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY2_6="%%codec3%%" CODEC_ENABLE2_7="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY2_7="%%codec3%%" CODEC_ENABLE2_8="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY2_8="%%codec3%%"
#Codec 4 G729A CODEC_ENABLE3_1="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY3_1="%%codec4%%" CODEC_ENABLE3_2="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY3_2="%%codec4%%" CODEC_ENABLE3_3="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY3_3="%%codec4%%" CODEC_ENABLE3_4="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY3_4="%%codec4%%" CODEC_ENABLE3_5="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY3_5="%%codec4%%" CODEC_ENABLE3_6="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY3_6="%%codec4%%" CODEC_ENABLE3_7="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY3_7="%%codec4%%" CODEC_ENABLE3_8="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY3_8="%%codec4%%"
#Codec 5 G711U CODEC_ENABLE4_1="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY4_1="%%codec2%%" CODEC_ENABLE4_2="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY4_2="%%codec2%%" CODEC_ENABLE4_3="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY4_3="%%codec2%%" CODEC_ENABLE4_4="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY4_4="%%codec2%%" CODEC_ENABLE4_5="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY4_5="%%codec2%%" CODEC_ENABLE4_6="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY4_6="%%codec2%%" CODEC_ENABLE4_7="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY4_7="%%codec2%%" CODEC_ENABLE4_8="Y" CODEC_PRIORITY4_8="%%codec2%%"
#General Codec Settings CODEC_G711_REQ="1"
############################################################ # Provisioning settings # ############################################################ OPTION66_ENABLE="Y" OPTION66_REBOOT="Y" PROVISION_ENABLE="Y" CFG_CYCLIC_INTVL="1440" CFG_RESYNC_FROM_SIP="check-sync"
############################################################ # Enable Webserver # ############################################################ HTTPD_PORTOPEN_AUTO="Y" #1=US-ENG 2=UK-ENG 4=German WEB_LANGUAGE="1"
############################################################ # Firmware Update # ############################################################ FIRM_UPGRADE_ENABLE="Y" FIRM_UPGRADE_AUTO="Y"
############################################################ # Time and Date # ############################################################ ## System Time Settings # Time Zone in minutes i.e. GMT+1=60 GMT+0=0 GMT-1= -60 #TIME_ZONE="%%param::time_timezone_panasonic%%"
## Time Adjust Settings (NTP) NTP_ADDR="%%param::time_ntp_server%%" NTP_PORT="123" TIME_SYNC_INTVL="60" TIME_QUERY_INTVL="43200"
# DST Settings DST_ENABLE="%%dstEnableDisable%%" #DST_OFFSET="%%param::time_dst_saving_minutes%%" #DST_START_MONTH="%%param::time_dst_start_month%%" DST_START_ORDINAL_DAY="1" DST_START_DAY_OF_WEEK="0" #DST_START_TIME="%%param::time_dst_start_minute%%" #DST_STOP_MONTH="%%param::time_dst_end_month%%" DST_STOP_ORDINAL_DAY="4" DST_STOP_DAY_OF_WEEK="0" #DST_STOP_TIME="%%param::time_dst_end_minute%%" LOCAL_TIME_ZONE_POSIX=""
## Time And Date Format #For AM/PM Use Option 0 for 24h Mode 2 DISPLAY_TIME_PATTERN="2"
#For "MMM. DD" use 2 for "DD MMM." use 0 DISPLAY_DATE_PATTERN="0"
############################################################ # Ring and dial tone # ############################################################ ## Tone Settings dafault US UK/German in line
## Dial Tone #For Germany type here DIAL_TONE1_FRQ="440,440" DIAL_TONE1_FRQ="350,440" DIAL_TONE1_GAIN="0" DIAL_TONE1_RPT="0" #For Germany type here DIAL_TONE_TIMING="0,0,0,0" DIAL_TONE1_TIMING="60,0"
## Busy tone #For Germany type here BUSY_TONE_FRQ="440,0" BUSY_TONE_FRQ="480,620" BUSY_TONE_GAIN="0" BUSY_TONE_RPT="1" #For Germany type here BUSY_TONE_TIMING="500,500,500,500" BUSY_TONE_TIMING="60,500,440"
## Reorder tone #For Germany type here REORDER_TONE_FRQ="480,440" REORDER_TONE_FRQ="480,620" REORDER_TONE_GAIN="0" REORDER_TONE_RPT="1" #For Germany type here REORDER_TONE_TIMING="250,250,250,250,250,250,250,250" REORDER_TONE_TIMING="60,250,190"
##Ring back tone #For Germany type here RINGBACK_TONE_FRQ="440,0" RINGBACK_TONE_FRQ="440,480" RINGBACK_TONE_GAIN="0" RINGBACK_TONE_RPT="1" #For Germany type here RINGING_TONE_TIMING="2000,4000,2000,4000" RINGBACK_TONE_TIMING="60,2000,3940"
## Hold tone HOLD_ALARM_FRQ="425" HOLD_ALARM_GAIN="0" HOLD_ALARM_RPT="1" HOLD_ALARM_TIMING="120,14880"
## Call Waiting Tone CW_TONE1_FRQ="425" CW_TONE1_GAIN="0" CW_TONE1_RPT="1" CW_TONE1_TIMING="120,120,120,120,120,14400"
##Hold tone #For Germany type here HOLD_TONE_FRQ=""440" HOLD_TONE_FRQ="425" HOLD_TONE_GAIN="0" HOLD_TONE_RPT="1" HOLD_TONE_TIMING="500,190,190,190,2890"
##Bell core rythem BELL_CORE_PATTERN1_TIMING="2000,4000" BELL_CORE_PATTERN2_TIMING="800,400,800,4000" BELL_CORE_PATTERN3_TIMING="400,200,400,200,800,4000" BELL_CORE_PATTERN4_TIMING="300,200,1000,200,300,4000" BELL_CORE_PATTERN5_TIMING="500"
##To be enabled only for Germany #STT_TONE_FRQ="0,440" #STT_TONE_TIMING="100,100,100,100,100,100,100,100,100,100,100,100,100,100,100," #100,100,100,100,100,0,0" #HOWLER_TONE_FRQ="1400,2060" #HOWLER_TONE_TIMING="100,100,100,100" #HOWLER_START_TIME="30"
